response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive exceptional value while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
